'''Salty Sam''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A merchant plying his wears in Fort Deadlight.

## Interactions

|wares           = Weapons, armor, and adventuring gear. Unique items include [The Bloody Links](/theBloodyLinks/).
